column2: Requires Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire

Crystalline formations of dragon magic, veined with blue.
Emissaries in the Eye of the North have interest in these.
Obtained from Priority Strikes or by combining shards.
Contains 1 Drop of Liquid Karma and 1 Prophet Shard.
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Wield.</c> Blast your foe with rapid fire from your pistol.
Call of the Mists is active in WvW and PvP.
Point of Interest: The Wrecking Yard
This will change the appearance of your mount and unlock this mount skin for all characters on your account.
Unlocks the reward track for the Guildrider Warclaw skin.
The Mists beckon those with a competitive spirit to battle! Gain the Call of the Mists effect to enhance reward progress while in PvP and WvW.
Point of Interest: Three Legions Court

Crystalline formations of dragon magic, veined with red.
Emissaries in the Eye of the North have interest in these.
Obtained from Priority Strikes or by combining shards.
This mount skin can be acquired by completing the Guildrider Warclaw Skin Reward Track in WvW.
Adds the Special Forces Training Area as a destination to the Eye of the North gate.
Create a smoke screen that causes missiles to miss and blinds foes.
The Mists beckon those with a competitive spirit to battle! Gain the Call of the Mists effect to enhance reward progress while in PvP and WvW.
Point of Interest: Heart of the Snow Leopard
Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.
You helped Rox take back North Nolan Hatchery!

Crystalline formations of dragon magic, veined with red.
Emissaries in the Eye of the North have interest in these.
Obtained from Priority Strikes or by combining shards.
Adds your home as a destination to the Eye of the North gate.
Purchased from Strum Bassclash in Plains of Ashford, Shaman Vigmarr in Wayfarer Foothills, Fisher Travis in Queensdale, Elain in Caledon Forest, and Blopp in Metrica Province.
Join a public version of Forging Steel. Player limit: 10.
<c=@flavor>This container crackles ominously. Double-click to choose an account-bound reward.</c>
Rare chance of one of the following:
Join Braham and repel the Molten Alliance threat at Cragstead.
Upgrade Special Black Lion Red Dye Canisters
Use to unlock exclusive Black Lion Chest red dyes, or use to combine several canisters and upgrade their rarity.
Double-click to choose an armor class.
Collect all the Magic Coins in the Super Adventure Hub as quickly as you can!
Use to gain the Black Lion Chest exclusive dye Red Lion.
Create a private version of Forging Steel for your party or squad. Take on additional challenges at the challenge mote to increase your mission rank. Player limit: 10.
Annihilate the Molten Alliance invasion at North Nolan Hatchery, and introduce Rox to a new friend.
Join forces with Marjory and Kasmeer to infiltrate the Nightmare Tower and defeat the Toxic Alliance at Kessex Hills.
This elixir is only effective during April Fools.
